title: Full Throttle!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>That’s a lot of luggage, Setsuna-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ah, good day, Kanan-san. I need these things to cheer for CYaRon. I brought light sticks, towels, a change of clothes.... and binoculars, just in case!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha! You’re all set to enjoy the live, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>It’s CYaRon, after all! I’ve been at full throttle since this morning!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>If you’re that energetic from now, won’t you be tired by the start of the live? Are you doing okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Don’t worry, I use a different power reserve for lives. By the way, you have quite the luggage too, Kanan-san. Could it be that you’re also....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Eh!? No, this is, umm....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I get it.... I truly get it, Kanan-san! You’ve also been at full throttle since this morning, right!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Uuu, there’s no getting around you, huh, Setsuna-chan~. Yeah, I’ve also been at full throttle!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fufu. Then, let’s enjoy this live with all of our might!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
